quotes.text: If you are the smartest person in a room, you are in the wrong room
Human is the measure of all things
What good will it be for someone to gain the whole world, yet forfeit their soul?
Assume everyone you talk to have something for you to learn from
If your mouth open, you"re not listenting
You either die a hero, or live long enough to see yourself become the villain.
Learn to give and not to count the cost.
Be like a duck. Looks calm in the surface, but below, paddle like hell

If you are willing to look at another persons behaviour towards you as a reflection of the state of their relationship with themselves rather than a statement about you as a person, then you will, over time, cease to react at all
It's easier to invent the future than predict it
A ship in harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for.
You can be the sweetest peach on the tree, but some people just don't like peaches.
Progress, far from consisting in change, depends on retentiveness. Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
